description:
Application for non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2013/1423/FUL dated 30/03/2015 to amend conditions 11 (CEMP) and 23 (BREEAM) and insert new condition 55 (construction contract) as follows:

For each Section of the development, associated demolition hereby consented must be carried out in accordance with a construction contract with the builder(s) to complete the associated redevelopment work which has been granted planning permission. 

REASON: To prevent premature demolition in order to preserve the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.
